attributes.action: reject the Euro in favour of adopting the yen as a basic unit of currency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will make things much cheaper for travelling to Japan as well as forging closer ties between the UK and Japan, which is important given the recent EU agreement with South Korea and will put the UK in a more favourable position in Asia over the next few hundred years. You know it makes sense.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
